title: How daydreaming can improve your mental health & cognitive flexibility + tips to get the most out of your “Thinker” moments
description:
Get my new book Cleaning up Your Mental Mess here: https://www.cleaningupyourmentalmess.com

SHOW DESCRIPTION: Although it may seem contradictory, letting your mind daydream is actually really good for your mental health! In this podcast I talk about the many mental and physical health benefits of just letting your mind wander, and how to do "thinker" moments correctly so you get the most out of these moments. 

Read the show blog here: https://drleaf.com/blogs/news/why-we-need-more-thinker-moments-the-mental-health-benefits-of-daydreaming-doodling
